results.text: You are a gifted ventriloquist, making it seem like your voice is coming from a different direction. Creatures who investigate this have disadvantage on any checks made to infer your position.

You are adept at feigning emotion, especially when it gets you what you want. Until you complete a short or long rest, you gain an expertise die to Deception checks made to conceal your emotions behind another (such as feigning interest when you’re bored, laughing at a terrible joke, etc.).
Your ability to lie is unmatched. You have advantage on your next Deception check against the target creature.
Sometimes, telling the truth is what’s needed to throw someone off your trail. You tell the target creature one piece of truthful information but they wholeheartedly believe it to be a lie.
You are not only a master of creating a cipher but also at cracking them. You gain an expertise die on checks made to decipher any coded language for the next hour.

You may be clandestine, but sometimes your companions are not. In the next hour, if an ally fails a check that would alert enemies to your presence, you may use your reaction to mimic a birdcall or some other natural noise as a distraction. The triggering ally gains an expertise die to the failed roll, potentially turning it into a success.
